name: Simple Slide Deck & Presentation Template
description:
This is a simple but robust presentation template and presentation deck that can be used for consulting, investor or sales pitches.


It is built for simplicity, consistency and speed so you're able to focus on the message.


It includes:

  • 100+ components
  • More than 20 pre-built slide templates that are easily versioned in to dozens of possibilities
  • Update Colors and Typography easily
  • Autolayout used
  • Logo, Footer and Header components for scaling your brand.
  • Hero image placeholders


If you have feedback, @ me or drop a note in the comments.
